content: show your pride and carry your stuff introducing the pride bag the perfect bag for all of your rallies crocheted in your choice of flag colors this little bag will fit a phone cash card and a lip balm the crossbody design makes it easily adjustable just tie a knot in the strap now you can wear your flag with pride and make one for all your friends too **yarn** worsted #4 approx 100 yards shown in wecrochet dishie blue ~35 yards mulberry ~25 yards and begonia ~35 yards **hook** us7/4 5mm **sizes** 5 tall 4 wide
